event.title: Bristol Data Science Meetup
event.description:
We are delighted to announce that the next Bristol Data Scientists Meetup will take place on the 3rd September. 

The meeting will be an informal event aimed at the promotion of and shared learning around Data Science and will consist of a few short presentations followed by networking time over a drink.

Agenda:

6.00pm Arrival and drinks

6.30pm  Welcome and Introduction byMatt Aldridge, Mango Solutions

6.45pm Presentations

• Life Under the Lens: Doing Data Science on Real Social Networks - Will Hardman, Elucidata

• DataKind UK: How Charities are harnessing the Power of Data - Emma Prest, DataKind UK

• Data mining using Apache Storm - Andrew Carr, Claritize

Following the presentations we cordially invite everyone to stay for a chat and a drink.
